00278 typedef struct gpio_pin_t
00279 {
00281         DQ_LINK;
00283         IMG_BOOL                        bActive;
00285         IMG_UINT8                       ui8BlockIndex;
00287         IMG_UINT8                       ui8PinNumber;
00289         GPIO_DIRECTION_T        Direction;
00291         IMG_BOOL                        bInterrupt;
00293         IMG_BOOL                        bDualEdgeTransitionInterrupt;
00295         GPIO_LEVEL_T            InterruptLevel;
00297         GPIO_CALLBACK_T         pfnInterruptCallback;
00299         IMG_PVOID                       pInterruptCallbackContext;
00300 }GPIO_PIN_T;
00301 
00302 
00310 typedef struct gpio_pin_settings_t
00311 {
00313     GPIO_DIRECTION_T                            Direction;
00314         union
00315         {
00316                 struct
00317                 {
00319                         GPIO_SCHMITT_T                  Schmitt;
00321                         GPIO_PULLUP_PULLDOWN_T  PullupPulldown;
00322                 }Input;
00323                 struct
00324                 {
00326                         GPIO_LEVEL_T                    Level;
00328                         GPIO_DRIVE_STRENGTH_T   DriveStrength;
00330                         GPIO_SLEW_T                             Slew;
00331                 }Output;
00332         };
00333 }GPIO_PIN_SETTINGS_T;

00757 /******************************************************************************
00758 *********** Schmitt Trigger,Slew Rate,Drive Strength Line Sharing *************
00759 *******************************************************************************/
00760 
00761 /* Below is a list of lines that are shared for Schmitt Trigger, Slew Rate and
00762     Drive Strength settings (if a setting is applied for one of the lines it will
00763         change the setting for the others in the same group) */
00764 
00765 /* Group 0 
00766 PLL_ON
00767 PA_ON
00768 RX_HP
00769 ANT_SEL0
00770 ANT_SEL1
00771 GAIN0
00772 GAIN1
00773 GAIN2
00774 GAIN3
00775 GAIN4
00776 GAIN5
00777 GAIN6
00778 GAIN7 */
00779 
00780 /* Group 1 
00781 PDM_A
00782 PDM_B
00783 CLK_OUT0 */
00784 
00785 /* Group 2 
00786 PDM_C
00787 PDM_D
00788 SCB0_SDAT
00789 SCB0_SCLK */
00790 
00791 /* Group 3 
00792 SPI1_MCLK
00793 SPI1_CS0
00794 SPI1_CS1
00795 SPI1_CS2
00796 SPI1_DOUT
00797 SPI1_DIN */
00798 
00799 /* Group 4 
00800 SCB1_SDAT
00801 SCB1_SCLK */
00802 
00803 /* Group 5 
00804 UART0_RXD
00805 UART0_TXD
00806 UART0_CTS
00807 UART0_RTS
00808 UART1_RXD
00809 UART1_TXD */
00810 
00811 /* Group 6 
00812 CLK_OUT1 */
00813 
00814 /* Group 7 
00815 SPI0_MCLK
00816 SPI0_CS0
00817 SPI0_CS1
00818 SPI0_CS2
00819 SPI0_DOUT
00820 SPI0_DIN */
00821 
00822 /* Group 8 
00823 SCB2_SCLK
00824 SCB2_SDAT */
00825 
00826 /* Group 9 
00827 PHYWAY_CLKOUT
00828 PHYWAY_VALOUT
00829 PHYWAY_CLKIN
00830 PHYWAY_VALIN
00831 PHYWAY_DATAOUT0
00832 PHYWAY_DATAOUT1
00833 PHYWAY_DATAOUT2
00834 PHYWAY_DATAOUT3
00835 PHYWAY_DATAOUT4
00836 PHYWAY_DATAOUT5
00837 PHYWAY_DATAOUT6
00838 PHYWAY_DATAOUT7
00839 PHYWAY_DATAIN0
00840 PHYWAY_DATAIN1
00841 PHYWAY_DATAIN2
00842 PHYWAY_DATAIN3
00843 PHYWAY_DATAIN4
00844 PHYWAY_DATAIN5
00845 PHYWAY_DATAIN6
00846 PHYWAY_DATAIN7 */
00847 
00848 /* Group 10 
00849 TMS
00850 TDI
00851 TRST
00852 TCK */
00853 
00854 /* Group 11 
00855 TS_CLK
00856 TS_SYNC
00857 TS_ERR
00858 TS_VALID0
00859 TS_VALID1
00860 TS_VALID2
00861 TS_DATA0
00862 TS_DATA1
00863 TS_DATA2
00864 TS_DATA3
00865 TS_DATA4
00866 TS_DATA5
00867 TS_DATA6
00868 TS_DATA7 */
00869 
00870 
00871 #endif /* __GPIO_API_H__ */
